name: Exceed
description:
The player plays as an inkman warrior who enters a magical, ever-shifting domain to rescue his brother. The protagonist’s brother is not the only being who has been abducted, however. Players can find sentient beings within the domain that will either assist or hinder the player’s journey to reach the summit.

Only 16:9 resolutions are Supported

[In Development] A final year project, for Media Design School, that will release in June/July 2022.

Feedback: https://forms.gle/PxYt1a28u5SAYVwq5

Report a bug: https://forms.gle/Kp14ZBBTBrXA95Lq5

Controls (Located in the settings menu):

  •     Controller or Keyboard & Mouse
